idea-plugin.name: Live Templates Sharing
idea-plugin.description:
Plugin allows sharing live templates by commiting them to VCS.

Project live templates are stored in .idea directory and shared with everybody working on the same repository.

Plugin imports live templates automatically on project opening.

Also, it adds two actions:
  • Import Project Live Templates - imports project live templates from project to IDE settings
  • Share Custom Live Templates - shares custom live templates from IDE settings to project

action.description: Imports project live templates from project to IDE settings
Shares custom live templates from IDE settings to project
